name: CitEscape
description:
This is my submission for Ludum Dare 41! This is also the first time I've ever really done game development, too, along with using most of the tools involved. I was really concerned about not having anything that I could submit by the end of the game jam period, but it worked out in the end.

Ludum Dare 41's theme was "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres." For this project, the genres are City Builder and Platformer. The game overall is rather simplistic, but this is the first time I've done this kind of thing. I hope you enjoyed it!

Instructions:
W/A/Left Arrow/Right Arrow - Move
Space - Jump
Q - Build House
E - Build Bridge
F - Restart 
M - Mute Music
Escape - Quit Game

Tools:
Unity - https://unity3d.com/
GraphicsGale - https://graphicsgale.com/us/
BeepBox - https://www.beepbox.co/
bfxr - https://www.bfxr.net/
